name: BookTrain
description: This API books a train ticket from the given from_city to the given to_city.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date of train departure. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: from_city
parameters.description: The city from which the train departs

parameters.name: to_city
parameters.description: The city where the train arrives

parameters.name: price_upperbound
parameters.description: The highest acceptable airfare. It can be empty (null), indicating no upper limit.

example.output: The G20 train from Beijing to Shanghai at 2023-09-13 07:40:00 has been successfully booked, and the price is 780 yuan.
